We’re in Vietnam this week, focused on how trade between our countries can create more jobs and opportunities for the middle class. Today I was in Ho Chi Minh City, visiting the Stock Exchange to open trading and working with business leaders to make sure trade benefits people in Canada and Vietnam.

Nous sommes au Vietnam cette semaine pour voir comment le commerce entre nos pays peut créer davantage d’emplois et de débouchés destinés à la classe moyenne.
